snippet: The World Trade Center Transportation Hub has taken longer and will cost much more than originally projected, but it's clear that New York and New Jersey will get some serious architecture.
abstract: The World Trade Center Transportation Hub has taken longer and will cost much more than originally projected, but it's clear that New York and New Jersey will get some serious architecture.

headline.main: World Trade Center Transportation Hub Assumes Its Sinuous Form
